articles.title: Murdoch Family Settles Media Empire Succession Battle
articles.summary: **Rupert Murdoch's** family reached a legal settlement ensuring eldest son **Lachlan** will inherit control of the **$15 billion** media empire after the **94-year-old** mogul's death. The deal ends years of succession disputes among siblings over **Fox News**, **Wall Street Journal**, and other major outlets.

articles.title: Nepal Police Kill 19 Gen Z Protesters in Deadly Crackdown
articles.summary: **Nepal** police opened fire on unarmed student protesters **Monday**, killing at least **19** young demonstrators. The **Gen Z** revolt erupted over government corruption and social media bans, marking the deadliest crackdown on youth activism in **Nepal's** recent history as tensions escalate nationwide.

articles.title: America's 400 Richest Worth Record Breaking $6.6 Trillion
articles.summary: The **Forbes 400** list reveals **America's** wealthiest individuals are collectively worth a record **$6.6 trillion** in **2025**. **Jeff Bezos**, **Jensen Huang**, and **Miriam Adelson** lead the rankings as billionaire fortunes surge despite economic uncertainties, breaking all previous wealth concentration records.

articles.title: US Housing Market Surges $20 Trillion in Five Years
articles.summary: **America's** housing market has gained **$20 trillion** in value over five years, climbing **57%** since **2020**, according to **Zillow**. **New York** added **$216 billion** last year while **Texas**, **Florida**, and **California** lost billions, highlighting dramatic regional disparities in property values.

articles.title: China's Unitree Robotics Targets $7 Billion IPO Valuation
articles.summary: **Chinese** robotics startup **Unitree** plans an initial public offering targeting a **$7 billion** valuation (**50 billion yuan**). The **Zhejiang**-based company leads **China's** humanoid robot development, competing globally in AI-powered machines for industrial and service applications as the sector rapidly expands.

articles.title: AI Startup Cognition Reaches $10.2 Billion Valuation
articles.summary: **Cognition**, developer of AI software engineer **Devin**, closed a **$400 million** funding round at a **$10.2 billion** valuation **Monday**. The startup acquired **Windsurf** in **July** after its founders left for **Google**, positioning itself as a major player in AI development tools.

articles.title: Russian Glide Bomb Kills 21 Civilians in Eastern Ukraine
articles.summary: A **Russian** glide bomb attack killed at least **21** civilians in a village near **Donetsk**, eastern **Ukraine**. President **Zelenskyy** condemned the strike, criticizing international response as **Russia** continues targeting populated areas while avoiding new sanctions for ongoing attacks on civilian infrastructure.

articles.title: French AI Mistral Secures $1.5 Billion From Chip Giant
articles.summary: **French** AI startup **Mistral** received **‚Ç¨1.3 billion** (**$1.5 billion**) from **Dutch** chip manufacturer **ASML** **Tuesday**. **ASML**, valued at **$308 billion**, took an **11%** stake, becoming **Mistral's** largest shareholder as **Europe** pushes to compete with **OpenAI** in artificial intelligence.

articles.title: French Government Falls After Prime Minister Loses Confidence Vote
articles.summary: **French** lawmakers ousted Prime Minister **Fran√ßois Bayrou** **Monday** with **364 MPs** voting against him, plunging **France** into political crisis. The government collapse leaves the country without leadership amid rising borrowing costs and economic strain, marking **France's** second government fall this year.

articles.title: Trump's Net Worth Jumps $3 Billion Thanks to Presidency
articles.summary: **Donald Trump's** net worth increased by **$3 billion** in one year, jumping **118 spots** on the **Forbes 400** list. After falling off in **2023**, **Trump** returned as his political prospects improved, with his presidency significantly boosting his business valuations and wealth rankings.

dailyGreeting: Good morning! Wealth and power reshape our world today.

historicalEvents.description: Continental Congress officially names country 'United States of America'
North Korea established as communist state under Kim Il-sung
Ahmad Shah Massoud assassinated by Al-Qaeda suicide bombers
